Class File_Access

java.lang.Object
  File_Access

public class File_Access
extends java.lang.Object

Write a description of class File_Access here. This is the class that will control the movement of files from one directory/device to another using the java.io.file.

Version:
(0.1A)
Author:
(Danuel Williams)

Method Detail

fileMove

public boolean fileMove(java.lang.String filePathA,
                        java.lang.String filePathB)
Moves a file from path A to path B and returns a value of true if the transfer was successful

Parameters:
filePathA - - Origin file path
filePathB - - Destination file path
Returns:
TRUE - File has been transferred successfully
FALSE - File has encountered some errors in transfer

filePathSizeCheck

public void filePathSizeCheck(java.lang.String filePath)
This method will check and return the file size of the path that was given

Parameters:
filePath - - This is the file path that will be checked by this method

filePathVerify

public boolean filePathVerify(java.lang.String filePath)
This method will verify that the file path that was given does indeed have files in it and it is not empty

Parameters:
filePath - File path that will be checked by this method
Returns:
TRUE - For a file path that is occupied
FALSE - for a file path that is vacant

listPath

public java.lang.String[] listPath(java.lang.String pathName)
Lists the files in a path that has been passed as an argument

Parameters:
pathName - - Path name we will be analysing and getting results from for files
Returns:
returns a String[] with the names of the files in the directory

pathEdit

public java.lang.String pathEdit(java.lang.String filePath)
This method will take a Path name as an argument and then parse it into a suitable form for use in the functions of the File_Access class

Parameters:
- - filePath - file path that is in need of formatting.
Returns:
Formatted String
